document.full_text: yemen's opposition stepped up efforts to remove president ali abdullah saleh on thursday, dismissing his offer to stand down after a presidential election at the end of the year.
document.title: yemeni opposition says no to saleh's new offer
lines_and_colors: yemen's opposition stepped up efforts to remove president ali abdullah saleh on thursday, dismissing his offer to stand down after a presidential election at the end of the year.
